person.persName: Ira G. Copley (Wayne County, West Virginia, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Wayne County, West Virginia, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Amelia (Milley) Damron Copley. Father of Anna Copley, James Copley, Tennessee Copley, Samuel Copley, Polly Copley, William H. Copley, Genevra Copley, Laura B. Copley. Married to Mary Jane Smith Copley in Catlettsburg, Kentucky, on May 24, 1864. Farmer in Wayne County, Virginia, in 1850. Farmer in Wayne County, Virginia, in 1860. Served in the 5th West Virginia Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as first lieutenant from September 2, 1861 to March 20, 1862. Groceryman in 1864.
